item.title: Analyst Dan Ives rode in a Tesla robotaxi and said it exceeded his expectations
item.description: Ives has a Wall Street-high price target for the electric vehicle maker.

item.title: Buy this personal care stock as fundamentals improve, Deutsche Bank says
item.description: The bank upgraded shares to buy from hold and raised its price target to the highest on the Street.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts like these three stocks for long-term growth
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service reveals three stocks, including Chewy and Pinterest, favored by Wall Street's top pros.

item.title: China car suppliers can be early winners in the humanoid race, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: If the future is all about building mechanical mobility, whether on wheels or robotic legs, auto parts suppliers have a competitive edge.

item.title: 5 income-producing stocks to buy for the second half
